title: Goat Funded Trader 40% OFF
description: Goat Funded Trader, based in Hong Kong, was established in June 2023. It operates as a CFD prop trading firm and lists three program types: Instant, 1 Step, and 2 Steps. Supported trading platforms include MT5, cTrader, Match Trader, TradeLocker and Volumetrica FX. The firm reports a review score of 4.3 out of 5 based on 546 reviews. Traders can access the firm
forbidden_strategies: switch strategies between assessment and funded stages
and duplicate trades or trade ideas across accounts
Martingale / Grid Recovery Systems Strategies that increase lot size after losses (Martingale or grid) are strictly prohibited.
including: Using over 80% of available margin on a single trade.

Traders are strictly prohibited from accessing or operating their account on any shared mobile or desktop device. Detection of account activity from a shared device especially one linked to multiple user accounts will result in immediate disqualification from payout eligibility and may lead to account termination.
Spreading false information or engaging in negative advertising about Goat Funded Trader on social media or public platforms is strictly prohibited.

payout_limits: The first two payouts are capped at 6% of the initial balance
with no limits thereafter. This applies to all programs.
payout_policy.processing_time: Bi-weekly, First payout on demand with add-on
payout_policy.details: Instant Funding Models [Goat & Pro]: Payout Frequency: Bi-weekly, First payout on demand with add-on on the Instant Pro Only. Profit Split: 80%, 100% with Add-on. 1 Step, 2 Step [Goat Standard & Pro] & 3 Step Models: Payout Frequency: Bi-weekly, First payout on demand with add-on. Profit Split: 80%, 100% with Add-on. For the first Reward on Demand with Add-on, the Minimum profitable trading days still applies, a minimum of 3% in profit and a 40% profit split will be applied. After this, traders become eligible for subsequent rewards every 14 at the usual full 80% profit split.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Copy trading of any kind is strictly prohibited. Each account must be traded individually, and traders cannot duplicate trades or trade ideas, whether manually or via EA between accounts at any stage.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Yes, you can use them as long as the EAs comply with the prohibited trading practices rule. However, you are not allowed to use high-frequency trading (HFT) strategies / systems and/or Gold Arbitrage EA.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: 30 consecutive days, Inactive accounts within this period are breached
firm_rules.news_trading: News trading is allowed, but trades opened/closed (either manually or automatically, such as via stop loss, take profit, or pending orders) within 2 minutes before or after high-impact news can generate a maximum profit of 1% of the accountâ€™s initial balance. Excess profits are removed without penalties. This applies to both challenge and funded phases.
forbidden_strategies: switch strategies between assessment and funded stages
and duplicate trades or trade ideas across accounts
Martingale / Grid Recovery Systems Strategies that increase lot size after losses (Martingale or grid) are strictly prohibited.
including: Using over 80% of available margin on a single trade.

Traders are strictly prohibited from accessing or operating their account on any shared mobile or desktop device. Detection of account activity from a shared device especially one linked to multiple user accounts will result in immediate disqualification from payout eligibility and may lead to account termination.
Spreading false information or engaging in negative advertising about Goat Funded Trader on social media or public platforms is strictly prohibited.
firm_rules.ip_vpn_policy: Standard procedures; Maintain account integrity. Shared Device Usage prohibited.
risk_rules: Funded Traders daily profits are capped at $3
Profits from trades held under 2 minutes on funded accounts are not counted
Risk limit: GFT may impose a 1% risk limit per trade idea if excessive risk-taking is detected.
Goat Guard: Automatically closes all open trades if they reach a 2% loss to prevent excessive drawdowns. This soft breach allows immediate continued trading
with no ban. Triggering it once reduces profit split to 50%; a second time breaches the account fully.
Instant Funding Max Loss Per Trade Rule: Your account will be permanently closed if floating losses reach -2% of your balance at any time.
